channel.title: Controling other player's comments

item.title: Controling other player's comments
item.dc:creator: @Pk_all_Noobz Pk all Noobz
item.description:
@Pk_all_Noobz wrote:

I’m having some problems with getting it to work…

Sometimes it says 1 word other times it says none it never says more than 1 word.

can anyone help me with this?

if (command.startsWith("control") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner")) { String[] args = command.split(","); String name = (args[1]); String s = (args[2]); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.plrText = s; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; }catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Read full topic
